Container.Name: esir-openwrt
Container.Overview:
esirpg/buddha/sbin/init
Buddha Version of OpenWrt, featuring bypassing GFW, Contains 6 main apps i.e. Luci-Clash / Luci-Openclash / SSR+ / VSSR / Passwall / Bypass. Support SS, SS-rust, SSR, V2ray, Xray, Trojan, Naiveproxy, Clash protocols, etc. And Samba KMS DDNS.
Arch：AMD64
Video Tutorial available on Youtube Channel (in Mandarin)：https://youtu.be/jXMgAz_GQxI
Container.Description:

Arch：AMD64
Video Tutorial available on Youtube Channel (in Mandarin)：https://youtu.be/jXMgAz_GQxI
